Key Match Events: India lose 0-3 to Qatar in FIFA World Cup Qualifier match
Qatar score their third goal as Waad Albayati sends in a cross from the left, which is headed inside the post by Gaber AbdulSallam
India concede an early goal in the second half. Akram Afif tests Amrinder from the right side, close to the post and the goalkeeper fails to save the ball in the first attempt.

Sunil Chhetri poaches after the ball, which is rolled back towards the Qatar goalkeeper, who then plays it to Boualem Khoukhi. Unaware of Chhetri charging at him, he takes a bit late and makes an error.
A beautiful set-up by the Indian midfielders, before they release the ball in the middle just outside the box. Apuia gets a free shot at the target but he hits it way above the crossbar.
Jhingan and Mustafa Meshaal go for an aerial ball close to the halfline. The Qatar player goes down and it is a yellow card for Jhingan.
Good save, making his body appear bigger than the post. That will also lift his confidence.
India try to build an attack from the left but the ball is sent for a throw-in. India look for a quick restart but is stopped by the referee as Tamim Mansour is down on the ground.
India try to build possession before they lose it near the centreline. Rahul Bheke makes a crucial interception inside the box.
Qatar get another corner and Akram Afif takes it short. A one-two near the flank, before the ball is crossed towards the post but it is headed wide by one of their player.
A good interception by Sandesh Jhingan inside the box, slides as Akram Afif takes a shot at the target. The ball hits him and goes over the bar. Corner is dealt comfortably by India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India endure their first defeat after coming into the tie with a 1-0 away win over Kuwait.
Qatar's winning run in FIFA World Cup qualifiers continue
Others: India vs Qatar, FIFA World Cup Qualifier Football Match Live: The referee blows the whistle for full-time. Qatar walk away with a 3-0 win with goals coming from Mustafa Meshaal, Al Moez Ali, and Gaber AbdulSallam.
India vs Qatar, FIFA World Cup Qualifier Football Match Live: The second half is underway and it is almost a similar story. India concede an early goal in the second half.
India vs Qatar, FIFA World Cup Qualifier Football Match Live: The stadium is buzzing with “Maa Tujhe Salam” chants.
